[[1996â97 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1996â97]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) participated in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[Turkish Second Football League 1995-96|1995-96]] season for the 22nd time. MÄ°Y had finished promotion group in 8th place and later couldn't take place in neither among the promoted teams nor promotion play-offs. The team also participated in [[TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ±]] (Turkey Cup) in [[TÃ¼rkiye KupasÄ± 1995-96|1995-96]] and eliminated at Round 3. ==League Participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[Turkish Second Football League 1995-96|1995-96]] Season. League played in three stages. In the first stage 50 teams in five groups (10 teams each) played for first two rankings to play in promotion group. Promotion group was consisted of those 10 teams. At the end of the second stage top two teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[Turkish First Football League 1996-97|1996-97]]. Remaining 8 teams in each ranking group played in classification groups, by carrying points and goals from ranking groups. Bottom two teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[Turkish Third Football League 1996-97|1996-97]] at the end of the season. In the third stage, 8 clubs (3 from the Promotion Group and 1 each from 5 Classificaiton groups) played one-leg play-off games in [[Ankara 19 MayÄ±s Stadium|Ankara]] to determine the third team to be promoted to First League[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/9596/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 7 March 2010.. [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group 3 consisted of 10 teams and finished first stage at first place. In promotion group, team finished 8th and couldn't promote; and couldn't play promotion play-off games either. ===Ranking group=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group 3 in [[Turkish Second Football League 1995-96|1995-96]] season is shown in the following tableStandings and results from [http://www.tff.org/Default.aspx?pageID=807&grupID=253#grp TFF Archive]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
